Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line the baking pan with parchment paper and spray with a non-stick cooking spray.

Melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat, simmer until the foam rises to the top, about 5 to 10 minutes. Remove the foam gently and pour the clear, golden butter through a fine mesh strainer into a bowl to filter out the remaining milk solids. Let the clarified butter cool.
Blend into sugar and egg until creamy. Mix in baking powder and almond extract. Introduce clarified butter. Alternate adding flour and cream. Pour into prepared pan.

Bake in the oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, typically for around 50 to 60 minutes. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 15 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
